Briscombe <mark@hubii.com> & Jens Ivar J\u00f8rdre <jensivar@hubii.com>","methods":{"addRole(string)":{"params":{"_role":"The concerned role"}},"addRoleAccessor(string,address)":{"params":{"_address":"The concerned address","_role":"The concerned role"}},"alphaByPhaseNumber(uint256)":{"params":{"_verificationPhaseNumber":"The required to resolve the alpha criterion"},"betaByPhaseNumber(uint256)":{"params":{"_verificationPhaseNumber":"The concerned verification phase number"},"return":"the beta value"},"betaCriterionMet()":{"return":"true if criterion has been met, else false"},"betaResolutionDeltaAmount(bool)":{"params":{"_status":"The concerned status"},"return":"the amount required to resolve the beta criterion     /// With E, A and a respectively representing the entirety (100%) value, the total amount staked and the amount staked on the given status the initial delta amount is calculated as     ///    delta = (beta * A - E * a) / (E - beta)     /// If there is a non-zero remainder in the calculation the delta is incremented by an additional unit"},"calculatePayout(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_firstVerificationPhaseNumber":"The first verification phase number to stage payout from","_lastVerificationPhaseNumber":"The last verification phase number to stage payout from","_wallet":"The address of the concerned wallet"},"return":"the payout"},"constructor":{"params":{"_bountyFund":"The address of bounty fund","_nextAlpha":"The next alpha criterion of this resolution engine","_nextBeta":"The next beta criterion of this resolution engine","_nextGamma":"The next gamma criterion of this resolution engine","_operator":"The address of operator","_oracle":"The address of oracle"}},"disable(string)":{"params":{"_action":"The action to disable"}},"disabled(string)":{"params":{"_name":"The name to gauge"}},"enable(string)":{"params":{"_action":"The action to enable"}},"enabled(string)":{"params":{"_name":"The name to gauge"}},"freeze()":{"details":"This operation can not be undone"},"gammaByPhaseNumber(uint256)":{"params":{"_verificationPhaseNumber":"The concerned verification phase number"},"return":"the gamma value"},"gammaCriterionMet()":{"return":"true if criterion has been met, else false"},"gammaResolutionDeltaAmount()":{"return":"the amount required to resolve the beta criterion     /// The gamma criterion is not monetary. Hence the value set of the criterion's resolution delta amount is binary. I.e. either the next wallet can stake an infinite amount (the total supply of the token) and still not meet the criterion, or else the next wallet can stake 0 and still meet the criterion."},"isRole(string)":{"params":{"_role":"The concerned role"},"return":"true if role has been set, else false"},"isRoleAccessor(string,address)":{"params":{"_address":"The concerned metrics"},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw the given amount"},"withdrawBounty(address)":{"notice":"Stage the bounty to the given address"}},"notice":"A resolution engine with criteria of Total Stake Amount relative to Bounty,   Directional Stake Fraction and Total Staking Wallets Count Resolve the staking market when: - The total number of tokens staked on the market is >= alpha times the number of tokens posted for the Bounty AND; - The percentage of tokens staked on either option across the market is >= beta % AND; - The total number of addresses staking tokens is >= alphaCriterionMet().return: true if criterion has been met, else false

alphaResolutionDeltaAmount().return: the amount required to resolve the alpha criterion

betaCriterionMet().return: true if criterion has been met, else false

betaResolutionDeltaAmount(bool).return: the amount required to resolve the beta criterion     /// With E, A and a respectively representing the entirety (100%) value, the total amount staked and the amount staked on the given status the initial delta amount is calculated as     ///    delta = (beta * A - E * a) / (E - beta)     /// If there is a non-zero remainder in the calculation the delta is incremented by an additional unit

params._firstVerificationPhaseNumber: The first verification phase number to stage payout from
params._lastVerificationPhaseNumber: The last verification phase number to stage payout from
params._wallet: The address of the concerned wallet

params._nextAlpha: The next alpha criterion of this resolution engine
params._nextBeta: The next beta criterion of this resolution engine
params._nextGamma: The next gamma criterion of this resolution engine

freeze().details: This operation can not be undone

gammaCriterionMet().return: true if criterion has been met, else false

gammaResolutionDeltaAmount().return: the amount required to resolve the beta criterion     /// The gamma criterion is not monetary. Hence the value set of the criterion's resolution delta amount is binary. I.e. either the next wallet can stake an infinite amount (the total supply of the token) and still not meet the criterion, or else the next wallet can stake 0 and still meet the criterion.

isRole(string).return: true if role has been set, else false

isRoleAccessor(string,address).return: true if address is the one of a registered accessor of role, else false

metricsByBlockNumber(uint256).details: Reverts if provided block number is higher than current block number

metricsByVerificationPhaseNumberAndWalle.details: Reverts if provided verification phase number is higher than current verification phase number

params._wallet: The address of the concerned wallet

resolveIfCriteriaMet().details: The function can only be called by oracle. be the current verification phase number

betaResolutionDeltaAmount(bool).notice: Return the amount to be staked by the next wallet to resolve the beta criterion for the given status

methods.constructor: `msg.sender` will be added as accessor to the owner role

disabled(string).notice: Gauge whether the name is disable

enabled(string).notice: Gauge whether the name is enabled

resolutionDeltaAmount(bool).notice: Return the amount to be staked by the next wallet to resolve the current market for the given status

resolveIfCriteriaMet().notice: Resolve the market in the current verification phase if resolution criteria have been met

stagePayout(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Stage the payout accrued by given wallet in the inclusive range of given verification phase numbers

stageStake(address).notice: Stage the amount staked in the current verification phase

withdrawBounty(address).notice: Stage the bounty to the given address

userdoc.notice: A resolution engine with criteria of Total Stake Amount relative to Bounty,   Directional Stake Fraction and Total Staking Wallets Count Resolve the staking market when: - The total number of tokens staked on the market is >= alpha times the number of tokens posted for the Bounty AND; - The percentage of tokens staked on either option across the market is >= beta % AND; - The total number of addresses staking tokens is >= gamma
